reviews.name: Prof Holland at the University of Oxford said -
reviews.text: The experts at Stemnovate gave helpful advice and continue to show an interest in our work â€“ a refreshing change to deal with such a professional and knowledgeable company

reviews.name: Academic Institution-University of Bern
reviews.text: Thank you for your presentations, they were really great and stimulating. I am very happy we met and that we could get the cells in culture !
